title: Block-ish/Worn Fonts
content:
Hi,

I’m trying to find powerful block like fonts that look like they have parts broken or worn on the edges..or kinda crumbling. I have seen a few that are good but can’t remember the names, etc. At the same time, I don’t want ones that are kinda corny looking if you know what I mean.

Any suggestions on fonts that may work??

Thanks!

 [‹ (x) Extraterrestial Highway sign - Computer {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808064627/http:/typophile.com/node/19110 "Go to previous forum topic") [Euskara signage ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808064627/http:/typophile.com/node/19079 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joesomebody

comments.content:
[http://withoutwalls.com/woodtype/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808064627/http:/withoutwalls.com/woodtype/ "http://withoutwalls.com/woodtype/")

I haven’t used them (followed a link on Typographica) but they do look to be a cut above.  
Tim
